TopicTitle: I really wish MP would come out. I am bored. :(

Articles.Content:
I just can't seem to get up the motivation to build and fly anymore..

I think I am burnt out on the gameplay.

I sincerely wish MP would come out, even in a basic form, so that I could enjoy the game again.

Don't we all want multiplayer? Have you tried DarkMultiPlayer, it's a mod that literally adds in multiplayer. It's installed like any other mod, as well. Here are some servers: http://d-mp.org/?p=slist , and the forum thread is here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-1-6-2-KSP-0-25-Alpha
You've been around for a long time so you're probably a veteran ... have you tried Hard Mode? Try landing on every celestial body with no fuel lines Maybe you already have!

Don't we all want multiplayer? Have you tried DarkMultiPlayer, it's a mod that literally adds in multiplayer. It's installed like any other mod, as well. Here are some servers: http://d-mp.org/?p=slist , and the forum thread is here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-1-6-2-KSP-0-25-Alpha

I tried out KMP a while back but it ran badly and seemed a mess.

The community seemed dead also.

I will check that out, ty.

You've been around for a long time so you're probably a veteran ... have you tried Hard Mode? Try landing on every celestial body with no fuel lines Maybe you already have!

Yea, I have landed on most things and done career mode.

Taken monstrosities across the solar system and landed things, that had no right being landed anywhere..lol

Good times.
